review: Easy to use. The setup was quick and simple. It is the best way to stream prime shows. Nice to watch on the large TV screen instead of always watching on the Kindle. I am very happy with the purchase.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Disappointing that there isn't more access to complete seasons of shows without purchasing. Also, disappointed not to be able to mirror from an iPad or apple device. Should have access to mirroring from IOS devises or access to download Xfinity.Works well with Amazon prime instant download
author: Robert J. Hicks
